text: Ara e'ibhabe amara tomara kache amadera nirdesakrame pratyadesa karechi anupranita grantha. Tumi to janate na granthakhana kemanatara, ara dharmabisbasa'o naya, kinta amara etike baniyechi eka aloka, -- era dbara amara patha dekhacchi amadera bandadera yadera amara iccha karachi. Ara tumi to niscaya'i patha dekhaccha sathika pathera dike
